page.title: 16OWERMOIGNE SCHOOL,HEAD'S DAY
page.content: {MRS CLARKE}LIVES IN{TOLPUDDLE.}HER ALARM GOES OFF AT 6.15 BUT SHE DOZES UNTIL 6.45.SHE GETS UP, FEEDS CAT,MAKES{CUP OF COFFEE}AND WALKS AROUND HER GARDEN.SHE PICKS UP HER SCHOOL THINGS AND DRIVES TO SCHOOL. MRS ENGLISH GIVES HER{ANOTHER CUP OF {COFFEE}WHILE SHE ANSWERS 'PHONE CALLS FROM CHILDREN'S PARENTS.AFTER ASSEMBLY HER OWN CLASS USUALLY DOES ENGLISH LANGUAGE OR NUMBER WORK.IN THE AFTERNOON THEY DO ACTIVITY WORK.AFTER SHOOL,IF SHE IS ENERGETIC SHE TIDIES UP THE CLASSROOM.WHEN SHE GETS HOME SHE GARDENS IF IT IS DRY AND VIDEO RECORDS T.V.PROGRAMMES OR GOES TO A MEETING.AT BEDTIME SHE DRINKS{MILKY {COFFEE}AND READS A BOOK BEFORE SLEEPING.{WE CALCULATED}THAT SHE DRANK ABOUT{TWELVE CUPS OF COFFEE}EACH DAY. {WE THINK SHE IS A LOVELY HEADMISTRESS.
